A Burglar's Errand

'Are you ready to go? We'll steal the sword back from those half-orcs in no time at all!'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This is a Solo quest, and cannot be completed with a Fellowship.</rgb>

'I have a message for you, [placeholder]... a secret message. The message is: \qPalma Brownlock waits for you at The Forsaken Inn.\q\n\n'I don't have any more information for you than this... and for your own good, I'll not tell you where I heard it.'
'You're supposed to talk to Palma Brownlock at The Forsaken Inn. That's the whole message!'

'I have a message for you, [placeholder]... a secret message. The message is: \qPalma Brownlock waits for you at The Forsaken Inn.\q\n\n'I don't have any more information for you than this... and for your own good, I'll not tell you where I heard it.'
Palma Brownlock is waiting for you at The Forsaken Inn in the Lone-lands, just off the Great East Road.\n\nYou received a mysterious message that one \qPalma Brownlock\q is waiting to speak with you.
'You're supposed to talk to Palma Brownlock at The Forsaken Inn. That's the whole message!'

Palma Brownlock is at The Forsaken Inn in the Lone-lands.\n\nPalma Brownlock is waiting to travel with you to the hideout of the half-orcs that stole the sword she mentioned.
'You're supposed to talk to Palma Brownlock at The Forsaken Inn. That's the whole message!'

Talk to Palma Brownlock and travel to Naerost
Bring Medhrod to Palma Brownlock

'I have a message for you, [placeholder]... a secret message. The message is: \qPalma Brownlock waits for you at The Forsaken Inn.\q\n\n'I don't have any more information for you than this... and for your own good, I'll not tell you where I heard it.'

'I have a message for you, [placeholder]... a secret message. The message is: \qPalma Brownlock waits for you at The Forsaken Inn.\q\n\n'I don't have any more information for you than this... and for your own good, I'll not tell you where I heard it.'

'You're [placeholder]? I heard about you from Atherol -- you helped him out not so long ago, he said. Something about mushrooms? Tasty mushrooms? Good. I'm glad I've found the right burglar. You don't happen to still have any of those mushrooms, do you? Willing to part with any of them? No, forget I asked.

'I've called you here about something more important than mushrooms -- hard to believe, I know! -- but some half-orcs have stolen this legendary sword, Medhrod, and the people around here are pretty upset about it. I don't know what's so important about this sword, but it had something to do with this old hero who once kept the road safe, and folk don't like it in the hands of the half-orcs!

'So what we're going to do is sneak into Naerost, the ruins they're using as their hideout, and you're going to grab the sword! Maybe that will cheer up the people around here -- they sure could use it! Just let me know when you're ready to go, and we can set out.'
'That was a good bit of burgling, [placeholder]!\n\n'You've got a sharp eye, even for a burglar. I'll return Medhrod to its rightful owners.'
'What happened to Medhrod, [placeholder]? Where has it gone?'
A burglar hones his skill by thieving items of little worth, but these excursions are mere dalliances when the fate of the Free Peoples is at stake.

'I have a message for you, [placeholder]... a secret message. The message is: \qPalma Brownlock waits for you at The Forsaken Inn.\q\n\n'I don't have any more information for you than this... and for your own good, I'll not tell you where I heard it.'
